step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with closed fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles as you do this.
You opened your fingers and extended your arms well. Try to relax your muscles more as you exhale and extend.
Excellent work on opening your fingers and extending your arms. Keep exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
Good continuation of the movement. Focus on maintaining shoulder height as you extend your arms.
You completed the first repetition well. Ensure your fists are fully closed and arms are drawn in for the next one.
Great start to the second repetition! Remember to inhale and really tighten those muscles as you bring your arms in.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms nicely. Continue to exhale and relax your muscles during this phase.
Well done on the arm extension and finger opening. Keep focusing on a relaxed exhale.
Good job maintaining the movement. Try to keep your arms at shoulder height throughout the extension.
You finished the exercise strong! Overall, you followed the instructions well, focusing on arm movements and muscle engagement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to focus on fully closing your fists and drawing your arms in while inhaling and tightening muscles. Then, open your fingers and extend your arms while exhaling and relaxing.
